tools.author: turbotrevi
tools.name: secretalphabet
tools.description: A tool that allows you to create a random secret code and write encrypted texts based on the secret code you have created.

tools.author: lemonsoda
tools.name: Drift Brush
tools.description: Drive. Drift. Draw. Drive the cars and drift to draw on the canvas.

tools.author: T.Socche
tools.name: Waving Writing
tools.description: A kinetic typography tool for a text raster where you can animate your text in a wave. You can upload your own fonts, and adjust lots of parameters. Then, do not forget to save a gif or a photo!

tools.author: turbotrevi
tools.name: tattoo brush
tools.description: draw using a simulation of a tattoo machine with various types of ink, various intensities and various skin tones

tools.description: A tool where u can type, make animation type, type with shape and also type in the 3 dimension and chose the dimension of the canvas

tools.author: cv
tools.name: RasterLab
tools.description: Turn images into stylized geometric color grids.
